document.masterDocTitle: First records of 31 species of butterflies and moths (Lepidoptera) in Cameroon, with remarks on their elevational ranges

subSubSection.paragraph:
D. punctifera
was known from several countries across Central and Eastern Africa (but none bordering with Cameroon), but also in Cote d'Ivoire and South Africa. In the Mount Cameroon region, it has a very broad elevational range from 30 m to 1,850 m a.s.l. (Fig. 13 ).
